statements: SELECT * FROM disputes WHERE dispute_id = 100
SELECT dispute_description, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'Pending'
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, dispute_resolution_date FROM disputes WHERE dispute_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_resolution_date DESC
SELECT dispute_description, blockchain_reference FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status IN ('Resolved', 'Closed')
SELECT * FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'resolved';
SELECT dispute_description FROM disputes WHERE dispute_id = 101;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_resolution_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'open' ORDER BY dispute_id DESC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, blockchain_reference FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'pending' ORDER BY dispute_resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_disputes;
SELECT dispute_description, resolution_method FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE dispute_id = 5;
SELECT resolution_status, resolution_date FROM resolution_process ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE resolution_method = 'arbitration';
SELECT * FROM resolution_process WHERE resolution_status = 'resolved' ORDER BY process_id ASC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_method, blockchain_transaction_id FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE resolution_method='Arbitration' ORDER BY dispute_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_method, blockchain_transaction_id FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE blockchain_transaction_id='b5c50b31-7e4f-4afd-85e3-b61feacf1e95';
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_method, blockchain_transaction_id FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE resolution_method='Mediation' AND blockchain_transaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_method, blockchain_transaction_id FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE dispute_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY dispute_id ASC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_method, blockchain_transaction_id FROM blockchain_disputes WHERE LENGTH(dispute_description) > 50 ORDER BY LENGTH(dispute_description) DESC;
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, user_id, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'resolved';
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, dispute_description, resolution_date FROM disputes WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM resolution_evidences WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, user_id, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'resolved';
SELECT dispute_id, user_id, resolution_date FROM disputes WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution_date FROM disputes ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT disputes.dispute_id, resolution_evidences.evidence_id, resolution_evidences.upload_date FROM disputes JOIN resolution_evidences ON disputes.dispute_id = resolution_evidences.dispute_id;
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, resolution_status FROM disputes;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_details FROM resolution_log WHERE dispute_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM disputes WHERE resolution_status = 'resolved';
SELECT dispute_id, resolution_status FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, r.log_details FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN resolution_log r ON r.dispute_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT u.username, r.log_timestamp, t.description FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN resolution_log r ON r.dispute_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM resolution_log WHERE log_details LIKE '%successful%' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, dispute_status FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_date DESC;
SELECT resolution_id, dispute_id, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_id, seller_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'resolved';
SELECT u.user_name, d.dispute_description, r.resolution_description FROM users u JOIN disputes d ON u.user_id = d.dispute_id JOIN resolutions r ON d.dispute_id = r.dispute_id;
SELECT t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, u.user_name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 10000;

SELECT b.block_hash, t.transaction_id, u.user_name FROM blockchain_data b JOIN transactions t ON b.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.block_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
